description: Transport Canada requires automotive-related data for planning and analysis. The data includes North America production forecasts, Canadian sales forecasts, and hybrid/electric vehicle forecasts. The goal is to estimate rail vehicle movement and support zero-emission vehicle sales targets.

**Tender Title**
Automotive Data

**Tender Reference Number**
cb-772-56482220

**Status**
This tender has expired.

**Publication Date**
January 29, 2024

**Brief Description**
Transport Canada requires forecasts on the number of vehicles sold and produced in Canada to estimate future rail transportation needs. The gathered data is intended to support analysis of measures to accelerate the adoption of hybrid and electric vehicles.

**Key Requirements**
• North American production forecasts
• Canadian sales forecasts
• Hybrid and electric vehicle sales forecasts

**Contact Information**
